parity_gates.name: Unit tests
parity_gates.evidence: 36 unit tests in fj-cache covering key generation, sensitivity, persistence, eviction, stability

parity_gates.name: Oracle/differential conformance
parity_gates.evidence: 5 oracle tests: determinism (100 iterations), sensitivity (6 fields), hit/miss, mode separation, collision resistance (1540+ keys)

parity_gates.name: Adversarial validation
parity_gates.evidence: 6 adversarial tests: large program, uniform rejection, empty program, delimiter injection, streaming/owned agreement, persistence

parity_gates.name: Metamorphic properties
parity_gates.evidence: 4 metamorphic tests: restart invariance, f(x)!=f(y), f!=g, eviction correctness

parity_gates.name: Performance targets
parity_gates.evidence: Streaming key gen: 234ns (<1µs target). Cache miss: 52ns (<200ns target). 32.6% improvement via zero-alloc hasher.

parity_gates.name: E2E scenarios
parity_gates.evidence: 6 E2E scenarios: hit/miss, key stability, eviction under pressure, strict rejection, hardened inclusion, collision resistance

parity_gates.name: Risk analysis
parity_gates.evidence: 5-threat risk note with mitigation evidence. 8 invariants verified.

parity_gates.name: Durability (RaptorQ)
parity_gates.evidence: conformance_report sidecar (25 symbols, 22 source, 3 repair), perf_delta sidecar (9 symbols, 8 source, 1 repair)

known_issues: No version string in cache key (coarse namespace separation only)
Delimiter injection in field values theoretically possible but SHA-256 prevents aliasing
